text: Ezɨ kɨ orazi, me gumazamizir inabazir osizirim isibar dɨbobonim dɨbori. Me 144,000 plan gumazamiziba, inabazir osizirim me garɨsi, me Israelɨn kantrin aven itir 12 plan anababa, vaghvagha men varazira, osizirim ini.(7:4) Osizirir kamnagh “Israelɨn kantrin aven itir 12 plan anababar” gun mɨgei. E Aruamu e ghaze, anabam, kar amebam o amizimɨn ghuzim. Ezɨ Israelba me ghaze, anabam, kar afeziamɨn ghuzim, egha me afeziabar gɨn zui.
